name: Mad Crash Racing
overview: It is called Mad Crash Racing but this isn't about racing for first, it is about avoid an accident with your beautiful red sport car. Do not drive the wrong way on the road. Press Space button to change the lane. Press Esc to quit game. The game will save the high-scores to the disk if it is not write protected. Warning! Be patient. Do not kill your good old Amiga while playing this game. Mad Crash Racing is the first game developed by József Trencsényi. In 1999, he founded the independent game developer company Artex Studios.
